summary: Simply adds a storage chest to both Volkihar Keep and Fort Dawnguard just inside the doors.
descriptionHtml:
Update: I lied, it didnt take me long to get around to making a Fort Dawnguard mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22263/

Should work fine with this mod, though there may be a bit of clipping. 

Basically I just wanted to move my stuff into Fort Dawnguard in the event someone does a nice overhaul of the two bases, or I get bored enough to make my own. So all this does is throw in a player owned norespawn chest just inside Volkihar Keep and Fort Dawnguard for loot dumping. I dont really even consider this a \"mod\", just a personal tweak I thought others might want but are too lazy to spend 5mins in the CK like my brother is lol.

Obviously this requires Dawnguard to be active.
author: Achromatis
